overview:
We specialize in providing innovative IT solutions; emergency & disaster management consultative services; and GIS strategies.

Our first phase of operation is to deliver a product that supports the recognized need for accurate and timely communication of pertinent data related to the elderly and special needs population to first responders, businesses and government agencies before, during, and after an emergency or disaster.

This need has been recognized by the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) over the years by saying â€œsubstantial improvement is necessary to integrate people with disabilities in emergency planning and readiness.â€ As seen from Hurricane Katrina in 2005 and Hurricane Ike in 2008, government and public safety agencies local, state, and federal are still struggling with this integration.

SNAPev is the first national online & phone registry that store and maps basic personal and medical information for persons with disabilities and the elderly population while giving government & public safety agencies around the clock access to the information before, during, and after an emergency or disaster.
